Installation
============

hypia is available thorugh pip or through installation by source from the GitHub page.

Via pip:

.. code:: bash

    >>> pip install hypia

or

.. code:: bash

    >>> pip install git+https://github.com/rhero12/hypia

Via source:

.. code:: bash

    >>> git clone https://github.com/rhero12/hypia
    >>> cd hypia
    >>> python setup.py install
